en.title: Do you agree to a divorce?
en.infoPara1: Your {{ session.divorceWho }} has based the breakdown of the marriage on the fact that you have been separated for 2 years, and that you give your consent (agreement) to a divorce.
en.infoPara2: The court must have your consent for the divorce to continue on these grounds.

expandingPanel.heading: What happens if you don't agree
expandingPanel.contentPara1: If you don't agree, then the divorce won't be able to continue based on 2 years separation with consent.
expandingPanel.contentPara2: The application will be returned to your {{ session.divorceWho }}. If they choose to continue, they will need to change the reason for divorce to one that doesn't need your consent.
expandingPanel.contentPara3: Your {{ session.divorceWho }} will have to pay Â£95 to change the reason. You may have to pay some or all of this extra fee if they've applied to claim their divorce costs.

consentDecree.header: Do you consent to a divorce?
consentDecree.labelNo: No, I don't give my consent

willDefend.header: Do you want to defend the divorce?
willDefend.labelNo: No, I don't want to defend
willDefend.answerNo: I will let the divorce proceed and won't try to prevent it (I don't intend to 'defend' it).
willDefend.answerYes: I will try to prevent the divorce based on this application (I intend to 'defend' it)

errors.consentRequired: Select if you consent to a divorce or not
errors.defenceRequired: Select if you want to defend or not
